abstract: The optical implant developer ReVision Optics raised $25 million in a Series D financing led by Domain Associates to support clinical trials in its quest to deliver the first commercial implants to replace reading glasses in an aging population.
lead_paragraph: The optical implant developer ReVision Optics raised $25 million in a Series D financing led by Domain Associates to support clinical trials in its quest to deliver the first commercial implants to replace reading glasses in an aging population.

headline.main: ReVision Sees $25 Million in New Round
